nodes.text: The Hydraatis was a plant native to the planet Dathomir. It grew in dry and rocky regions, filtering the air through filaments which trapped dust and bacteria. Once filtered, the filaments contracted to lock clean air inside, thus creating a humid environment where the hydraatis could absorb the small amount of water it needed to survive.
In around 14 BBY, the plant was encountered by Cal Kestis during his mission on the planet.
